property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: This attack gets X+1 damage. X equals the difficulty of the destroyed foundation. R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent's Ready Phase, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent does not block your attack, your attack gets +X damage. X equals 5 minus the control of your attack. E: Add 1 non-attack card from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an enhance ability, cancel its effects. Remove this card from the game. First F: Your foundations get -1 difficulty for the rest of this Combat Phase. During Your End Phase, add this card to your staging area face down as a foundation with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +3 damage or your opponent's next control check this turn gets -3 (your choice). E (6+): Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard this card from your card pool : After your opponent blocks an attack, cancel that block and discard it from your opponent's card pool. Your opponent may attempt to block that attack again with another card. Only playable if there are no other copies of this card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have destroyed a foundation during this attack's Enhance Step, this attack gets +2 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack may be played as a reversal to an attack that you did not block. E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent may not play enhances during their next attack's Enhance Step this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -3 speed (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets +2 speed. Void R Commit, discard 1 card: After your opponent plays an ability that would increase the speed of an attack, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is removed from your staging area due to your opponent's card effect, search your deck for 1 foundation that shares at least 2 resource symbols with your character and add it to your staging area ready. R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays an ability that removes a card from your staging area, they remove this card instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Your attacks with a printed blank text box get 'Powerful: 3'. R: After you play an attack with a printed blank text box, that attack gets 'Stun: 1' , 'Breaker: 1', or you may add 1 card from your hand to your momentum (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add 1 card from your momentum to your hand. Then discard this card from your card pool. R: After your opponent plays an ability that would reduce the damage of your attack, cancel its effects. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your powerful attacks get +1 to their powerful rating for the rest of this Combat Phase. R: After your opponent draws any number of cards due to a card effect, draw the same number of cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your powerful attack deals damage, commit 1 foundation in your opponent's staging area. E Commit: This attack gets +1 to its powerful rating. First F Commit, reveal your hand: Add 1 action card revealed this way to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 1 card and you draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets 'Powerful: 4'. E: If this attack deals damage, both players discard their entire momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, your next attack gets -2 difficulty and 'Stun: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an attack with a printed blank text box, draw 1 card. E: Your powerful attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Desperation E Commit: Choose one foundation in your opponent's staging area with an ability that reduces damage and turn it face down. That card is considered a foundation with a blank text box. E Commit: This attack gets -2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, reveal your hand: If you have no cards with printed keywords in your hand, draw 1 card. E Commit: This throw attack gets -3 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets +X damage. X equals this attack's powerful rating. First F: Reveal the top card of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays an ability that would increase this attack's damage by 3 or more, cancel its effects. First E Commit: If your powerful attack deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove this card from the game: Name a non-character card. If there is more than 1 copy of the named card in play, turn all copies of the named card in both players staging areas face down. Those cards are considered foundations with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your powerful attack gets +2 speed. R Commit: After an attack is played, it gets +1 or -1 damage (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy 1 foundation: Your opponent must add 1 foundation from their staging area to their card pool. E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of foundations in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation: After your attack deals 5 or more damage, add 1 card from your opponent's staging area to their card pool. R: After your attack deals damage, your opponent must add 1 foundation from their discard pile to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block with this card, commit 2 foundations in your opponent's staging area. R Commit 2 foundations: After your opponent plays an ability on an action card, discard it and cancel it's effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Your opponent chooses 1 foundation in their discard pile and adds it to their card pool. Lily R Commit, discard 1 attack: Before destroying a foundation to pay for the cost of an ability, commit it instead. This foundation still counts as being destroyed for the purposes of the ability's cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Water E: your opponent must add 1 foundation from their staging area to their card pool. E(5+): This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of Ranged attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Skip this attack's Enhance Step. If this attack deals damage, your opponent must add 1 card from their discard pile to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Only playable if you have played at least 1 other attack this turn. E Commit 1 foundation: Add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next ranged attack this turn gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Both players add the top card of their deck to their momentum. E: If this attack deals damage, both players lose 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent must add 1 foundation from their discard pile to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have played at least 1 other attack this turn. E: This attack gets +1 speed for every card in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, lose 2 vitality: After your opponent plays an ability that modifies control checks, cancel its effects. Your next control check this turn gets -2. Order F Destroy this foundation: Each player may add 1 foundation from their hand to their staging area ready.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Commit: Your Death and Order attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of cards in your opponent's card pool. E Commit: Your Water attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed for every foundation in your opponent's card pool. Desperation E Commit: Commit 1 foundation in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Add this card to your momentum. Your opponent may add 1 foundation from their staging area to their momentum to cancel this effect. E: Your attack gets +1 damage. Only playable if there is a foundation in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: Return this attack to its printed damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that would remove a card from your staging area, you may add 1 foundation from your hand to your staging area ready. E Commit: This Chaos, Fire or Life attack gets -3 speed (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: Water F Commit: Turn all face down cards in your opponent's card pool face up. Water E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Discard all face down cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add 1 foundation that you could normally play from your hand to your staging area ready. Only playable once per turn. E Commit 1 foundation: Your ranged attack gets +3 damage. Only playable if you have an ally card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation with a difficulty of 3 ore more: After a response ability is played, cancel its effects. F: Add 1 ally card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may block with this card from your staging area as if it were in your hand during the Block Step. E Commit: Ready 1 Air foundation with a difficulty of 3 or more that has not been readied this Combat Phase. You may play 1 additional enhance before passing priority to your opponent. Miska E: Add this card to your card pool face down as a multiple copy of your ranged attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your ranged attack is not blocked, your opponent must discard 1 card. E Destroy this asset, discard 1 card: Your opponent may not play any more enhances during this ranged attack's Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the highest difficulty printed on a foundation in your staging area. E Destroy 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the difficulty of the foundation you destroyed to pay for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum face up during your End Phase. First F Discard 1 card: Play this card as if it were in your hand, following all restrictions and paying all costs (no control check necessary). Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if there is at least 1 other attack in your card pool. You may destroy ally cards in addition to discarding momentum in order to pay for this card's multiple cost. E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of foundations in your staging area with a printed difficulty of 3 or more. Each multiple copy of this attack also gains this enhance ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Skip this attack's Enhance Step. If this attack is blocked, discard it from the card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, choose 1 foundation in your opponent's staging area and turn it face down. That card is considered a foundation with a blank text box.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Skip this attack's Enhance Step. If this attack is blocked, discard it from the card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum face up. E Add this card to your card pool: This attack gets +3 or -3 damage (your choice). Only playable if this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this card is added to your staging area by your character's ability, you may draw 1 card. E Add this card to your card pool: Both players may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Add this card to your card pool: Choose one ready foundation in your opponent's staging area and return it to its owner's hand. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, remove it from the game. E Remove this foundation from the game: No more enhance abilities may be played during this attack's Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an attack, that attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you block your opponent's attack, ready 2 foundations with a difficulty of 3 or more that have not been readied this turn. Your opponent may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation with a difficulty of 3 or more: This ranged attack gets +3 damage. F Add this card to your card pool: Commit 1 non-character card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card as a block, add it to your staging area committed. E Commit: If this throw attack is completely blocked, it deals no damage. E Commit: Your ally attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation and discard 1 block card: After your opponent plays an attack, choose 1 keyword ability on that attack. That ability may not be played during this attack's Enhance Step. R Commit, discard 1 block card: After you make a control check, that check gets +X. X equals the block modifier on the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you block an attack with a printed keyword ability, you may play a reversal from your hand following all restrictions and paying all costs (no control check necessary). F: Your next high attack this turn gets -2 difficulty and 'Stun: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your opponent's card effect, choose 2 cards in your discard pile and add them to your hand. E: Your weapon attack gets +3 damage. If your opponent blocks this attack, discard it and this card from the card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next control check this turn gets +X. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack played as a reversal is not blocked, you may play an additional reversal, following all restrictions and paying all costs. Evil E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's next control check gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack played as a reversal deals damage, discard all cards from your card pool. Water E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, ready 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack is unblockable. Chaos E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets 'Multiple: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total number of keyword abilities printed on cards in your card pool. E (5+): If this attack deals damage, your next combo attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Discard your hand: Your opponent discards their entire momentum. Draw back up to your character's hand size. E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack gets 'Stun: 2'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Skip this attack's Enhance Step. Your next attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Ready one of your opponent's foundations: Your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove this card from the game: Destroy 1 asset in your opponent's staging area. E Commit: Discard all action cards from both card pools.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 random card from your momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the printed block modifer of the discarded card. R Commit: After your attack is blocked, your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, lose 2 vitality: Give your attack either +2 speed or +3 damage (your choice). R Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays a form ability printed on a foundation in their staging area, destroy that foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent's Ready Phase, draw 1 card. Evil R Commit: After your opponent checks a 6, they add the checked card to their hand and re-check (only 1 re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: Evil E Commit: Your next mid attack this turn gets -2 difficulty. F Destroy this foundation: Control checks may not be modified by card abilities this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation, discard 1 momentum: Discard this attack from the card pool. Your opponent may draw 1 card or gain 3 vitality (their choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Discard 1 punch attack from your card pool. Only playable during your turn. R Commit 1 foundation: After your punch attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack with this card, draw 2 cards and gain 2 vitality. R Commit 1 foundation: After your punch attack deals damage, discard it and this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Your punch attacks get +1 speed and +1 damage for the rest of this Combat Phase. E: Return this attack's speed to its printed value.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, player may not play asset cards. F Lose 3 vitality: Destroy this asset. Any player may play this ability. Playable while committed. E Commit: If your punch attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets +3 damage. E Discard 1 card: Choose 1 card in your card pool. For the rest of this turn that card does not count towards progressive difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): Ready 1 foundation in your staging area that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, gain 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next punch attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed and +X damage. X equals the number of attacks discarded from your card pool this turn. E Discard 1 momentum: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Draw 2 cards. E: If this attack deals damage, look at the top card of your deck. You may add that card to the bottom of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, lose X vitality. After your opponent's Ready Phase, commit 1 foundation in your opponent's staging area. X equals half of the difficulty of the foundation you committed with this ability (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent's attack deals damage, draw 1 card. Good R Commit: After you play a combo ability, your attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Air E Destroy this foundation: Ready your character. Reese E: Your punch attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add this card to the top of your deck face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove this card from the game: Add the top card of your discard pile to your hand. E Commit, discard 1 card: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your punch attack deals damage, your next punch attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage. Air E Commit, lose 2 vitality: Discard 1 punch attack from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this foundation, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays an attack as a reversal, discard it and cancel its effects. R Commit: After you play an ability that discards a card from your card pool, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.
